name: The Adventure of a Lifetime
description:
The whole game takes place in the hospital room, with an adventure told by doodles drawn by Mason. Mason will die at the end of this game, you cannot change that. But you have the choice to join him on his adventure or not. After all, it's not about the destination, but the path you took to get there.

Made for Ludum Dare 50

Programming by Tyson Black,

Art by Some_Tiny_Dragon
